title: Market share of soft drink companies in South Africa 2010
summary: This is a bar chart representing Company in the x axis and Market share in South Africa in the y axis.
Company The Coca-Cola Co has the highest Market share in South Africa and PepsiCo Inc has the lowest Market share in South Africa.
The difference of Market share in South Africa between the highest and lowest Company is 44.3.
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Company in the x axis and Market share in South Africa in the y axis.
The Market share in South Africa is highest at Company The Coca-Cola Co and lowest at Company PepsiCo Inc.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart representing Company in the x axis and Market share in South Africa in the y axis.
Company The Coca-Cola Co has the highest Market share in South Africa and PepsiCo Inc has the lowest Market share in South Africa.
The difference of Market share in South Africa between the highest and lowest Company is 44.3.
max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Market share in South Africa for 4 number of Companys.
The Market share in South Africa is appeared to be the highest at Company The Coca-Cola Co and lowest at Company PepsiCo Inc.
Second maximum Market share in South Africa is found at Company Other.
The highest Company The Coca-Cola Co has 44.3 more Market share in South Africa than the lowest Company PepsiCo Inc.
Market share in South Africa at Company The Coca-Cola Co is 49.8 , second place is Other at 35.3, and thirdly is Tiger Brands Ltd at 9.4.
The lowest value 5.5 at PepsiCo Inc is almost 1.99 times smaller than the average value 25.0.
The Market share in South Africa is 100.0 if we add up values of all Companys.
